more_apps.title: WEB PAGE CAPTURE
more_apps.description: This app provides you with these functions.Web page capture is best tool to take screenshot of whole web page.It can take screenshot of any web page to store the web pages offline.You can take Screenshot of all text and images contain in view that you search in search view.Content and web view scroll at the end as you view easily captured in both image file and PDF file in your mobile storage.

more_apps.title: Status Downloader For WhatsApp
more_apps.description: Are you want to download wahtzapp status, story of your friends & beloved? , yes you can do this by download from this app.

more_apps.title: Video Downloader For Facebook
more_apps.description: Video down loader for Facebook is an app which allows you to download/save Facebook video for offline use which you want when you use. You can use this app when Facebook is not installed on your mobile phone. you can save/download videos from facebook wall, groups, comment, pages etc.

more_apps.title: Latest Dress Designs for Male-Female 2019
more_apps.description: Latest dress designs 2019 best app provide different ideas for male and female to design their dresses. Eid Dress Design Collection is offline app no need Wi-Fi to save the dress designs.Select your Favorite dress designs on Eid for best dress of eid 2019.
